title: What technology do meteorologists use to monitor droughts? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rain gauges. They will tell you if it is raining or not and when it is raining how much rain has fallen. If there is no rain falling then the rain gauges will be empty and they can safely say that there is a drought. When rain falls and the rain gauges fill up then, provided it happens frequently enough, and over a prolonged period, they can say that the drought has ended.
